Name: Wishes Unnumbered
Title: Raiden Shogun: Wishes Unnumbered
Source: Reward for inviting the Raiden Shogun to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Wishes Unnumbered
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1407]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1407] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14073]</color> once.
When your $[A1407], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14073]</color>: It will deal +1 additional DMG for every point of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Resolve</color> consumed.
(You must have $[A1407] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
